trans-unit.source: Controls how a document is printed, when printing from a Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: Controla cómo se imprime un documento desde una aplicación de formularios Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> controls how a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> is printed.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se implementa en una clase derivada, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> controles cómo un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> se imprime.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> invokes the print controller's <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> methods, which in turn tell the printer how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> invoca el controlador de impresión <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>, y <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> métodos, lo que a su vez saber cómo imprimir el documento de la impresora.

trans-unit.source: Print preview uses a specialized <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.
trans-unit.target: Vista previa de impresión utiliza especializada <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.

trans-unit.source: For an example of a print controller that is specialized for print preview, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener un ejemplo de un controlador de impresión que está especializado en vista previa de impresión, consulte la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> is used by <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, and not typically used directly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> se utiliza por <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>y no suele utilizarse directamente.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework includes three print controllers that are derived from <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> that help accomplish common tasks.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework incluye tres dispositivos de impresión que se derivan <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> que ayudan a realizar tareas comunes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController> prints a document to a printer.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController> imprime un documento a una impresora.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController> generates a preview of what the document will look like when printed and is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> classes.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController> genera una vista previa del aspecto que se el documento una vez impreso y utilizado por el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> clases.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> provides a printing status dialog during the printing process.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> proporciona un cuadro de diálogo Imprimir de estado durante el proceso de impresión.

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de cómo imprimir con formularios Windows Forms, vea la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> información general del espacio de nombres.

trans-unit.source: If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the <xref:System.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Si desea imprimir desde una aplicación de Windows Presentation Foundation, vea el <xref:System.Printing> espacio de nombres.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController" />.

trans-unit.source: for safe printing from a restricted dialog box.
trans-unit.target: para una impresión segura en un cuadro de diálogo restringido.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeración asociada: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting" />

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController" /> is used for print preview.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController" /> se utiliza para la vista previa de impresión.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> en todos los casos.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> que representa el documento que se está imprimiendo actualmente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se reemplaza en una clase derivada, se completa la secuencia de control que determina cuándo y cómo imprimir una página de un documento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> se llama inmediatamente después de la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> provoca la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> eventos.

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown inside a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> is not called.
trans-unit.target: Si se produce una excepción dentro de un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> eventos de un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> , no se llama.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> crea el <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> que se envía a la impresora.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Después de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> se llama, el <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> método establece la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> en un gráfico de una sola página.

trans-unit.source: (Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method to set how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: (Use el <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> método para establecer cómo imprimir una página de un documento.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can adjust page settings separately for each page.) The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, puede ajustar la configuración de página por separado para cada página.) El <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> método borra el <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, mientras que la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> método desasigna el objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> que representa el documento que se está imprimiendo actualmente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se reemplaza en una clase derivada, se completa la secuencia de control que determina cuándo y cómo imprimir un documento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> se llama inmediatamente después de la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> provoca la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> eventos.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> crea el <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> que se envía a la impresora.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Después de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> se llama, el <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> método establece la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> en un gráfico de una sola página.

trans-unit.source: (Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> method to determine when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: (Use el <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> método para determinar cuándo y cómo imprimir un documento.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can delay printing for 30 minutes or adjust the printer settings for the document.) The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, puede retrasar la impresión durante 30 minutos o ajustar la configuración de impresora para el documento.) El <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> método borra el <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, mientras que la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> método desasigna el objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> que representa el documento que se está imprimiendo actualmente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se reemplaza en una clase derivada, comienza la secuencia de control que determina cuándo y cómo imprimir una página de un documento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> that represents a page from a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> que representa una página de <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> is called immediately before the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> se llama inmediatamente antes del <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> provoca la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> eventos.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> crea el <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> que se envía a la impresora.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Después de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> se llama, el <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> método establece la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> en un gráfico de una sola página.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> método borra el <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, mientras que la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> método desasigna el objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method to set how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> método para establecer cómo imprimir una página de un documento.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can adjust page settings separately for each page.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, puede ajustar la configuración de página por separado para cada página.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> que representa el documento que se está imprimiendo actualmente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se reemplaza en una clase derivada, comienza la secuencia de control que determina cuándo y cómo imprimir un documento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> se llama inmediatamente después de la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> provoca la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> method to determine when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> método para determinar cuándo y cómo imprimir un documento.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can delay printing for 30 minutes or adjust the printer settings for the document.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, puede retrasar la impresión durante 30 minutos o ajustar la configuración de impresora para el documento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> crea el <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> que se envía a la impresora.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to one of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Después de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> se llama, el <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> método establece la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> a uno de una sola página.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> método borra el <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, mientras que la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> método desasigna el objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> method is a good place to verify that <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> are valid.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> método es un buen lugar para comprobar que <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> son válidos.
